p: In conclusion, the understanding of the diagnosis, prevention, spreading, and treatment for COVID-19 is rapidly evolving. CVDs may be precedent factors or incident complications in patients with COVID-19. Our clinical staff and physician should update latest information and be familiar with the possible complication related to COVID-19. Important considerations for the preventive and therapeutic use of treatment strategies should be kept in mind to mitigate the worse outcome, especially in these high-risk patients.
